name: livereload
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "2.4.1" %}

package:
    name: livereload
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: livereload-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/l/livereload/livereload-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    md5: e79d3de78f11b459392f347f7bb20309

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
    entry_points:
        - livereload = livereload.cli:main

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - tornado
        - six

test:
    imports:
        - livereload
    commands:
        - livereload --help

about:
    home: https://github.com/lepture/python-livereload
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    summary: Python LiveReload is an awesome tool for web developers

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
